name: places/ChIJHeEQYg72wokRiIU0jGZ7gzA
adrFormatAddress: 1481 5th Ave, New York, NY 10035-2768, USA

originalText.text: Absolutely  horrible. Man on Friday mornings verbally abuses you if you don’t tip him. Told me the Fare was $18 when it is only $12, Bc he wanted to pocket it. Last time I checked a tip is only deserved if you’re pleasant/respectful which he isn’t. He snatched my card from my hand so fast gave me a dirty look and told me “I don’t want to see your face here next Friday unless you plan on tipping me” then threw up the middle finger as I was driving off. needs to get fired since me and 12 other colleagues of mine stopped coming here solely because of him being disgusting!!!! I’ll gladly pay triple elsewhere so i never have to experience this abusive man again.

originalText.text: This business claims that hours and rates are as posted. however, some days they double the price for the service, without notice. They say you either pay what they say or don't park there. Department of consumer affairs has been notified. Don't park here.

text.text: This business claims that hours and rates are as posted. however, some days they double the price for the service, without notice. They say you either pay what they say or don't park there. Department of consumer affairs has been notified. Don't park here.

originalText.text: Parking attendant told me they were full an proceeded to take 3 cars after me who were not monthly but because the drivers were white. They make up there own prices an are very rude. They barley get business so they are greedy for tips an only want to accept cash payments. This place needs to be shut down !

originalText.text: Been coming here for months and today decided that there was a problem with parking my car. Instead of trying to resolve the problem, they verbally abuse you and yell at you. Don’t park here!
